line_1: BY turns transform'd into all kinds of shapes,
line_2: Constant to none, F—TE laughs, cries, struts, and scrapes:

line_1: Ev'n Wilye Nature, with her Protean Shapes,
line_2: Rarely from their Inquisitive Search escapes;

line_1: Will writhe their bodies in a thousand shapes;
line_2: Unskilful actors, like your mimic apes,

line_1: For see where yonder sage Arachnè shapes
line_2: Her subtile gin, that not a fly escapes!

line_1: Bids Vice and Folly take their natural shapes,
line_2: Turns duchesses to strumpets, beaux to apes;

line_1: When wanton Genii sport in antick Shapes.
line_2: No flitting Elf the subtle Eye escapes,
